summary: This is a daily assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York for August 9, 2019. It details staff post assignments, shift changes, and leave statuses for correctional officers and other personnel. The document appears to be a standard internal staffing log.

events.title: MCC Daily Staff Assignments
events.description: Standard daily assignment and shift change log for correctional center staff.

locations: MCC New York New York, NY
keyFacts: This is a staff assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York dated August 9, 2019.
The document lists numerous correctional officer posts and assignments, including Special Housing Units (SHU), escort duties, and control rooms.
It tracks shift changes, leave statuses (Sick, Annual, LWOP, AWOL), and overtime occurrences for the day.
The roster includes the names of several correctional officers and their assigned duties.
The document is a routine administrative record and does not contain any direct references to Jeffrey Epstein or case-related events.
